Name: Aztecs
Civ Bonus: Villagers carry +5 / Military units (except Monks) created 15% faster / +5 Monk hit points for each Monastery technology / Start with +50 gold

Name: Berbers
Civ Bonus: Villagers movement speed *1.1 (10% faster) / Ships movement speed *1.1 (10% faster) / Stable units cost *0.85 (15% cheaper) in Castle Age and *0.8 (20% cheaper) in Imperial Age

Name: Britons
Civ Bonus: Town Centers cost -50% wood upon reaching the Castle Age / Foot archers (excluding Skirmishers) have +1 range in Castle Age / +1 in Imperial Age (for +2 total) / Shepherds work 25% faster

Name: Burmese
Team Bonus: Relics visible on map (3x3 square, all visible)
Civ Bonus: Free Lumbercamp upgrades / Infantry +1 attack per Age (starting in Feudal) / Monastery techs cost *0.5 (50% cheaper)

Name: Byzantines
Civ Bonus: Buildings (except gates) have +10% HP in Dark Age, +20% HP in Feudal Age, +30% in Castle Age, +40% in Imperial Age / Spearman, skirmisher and camel lines cost 25% less / Fire Ships attack 20% faster / Imperial Age costs -33% / Town Watch is free

Name: Celts
Civ Bonus: Infantry move 15% faster / Lumberjacks work 15% faster / Siege weapons reload 20% faster / Sheep cannot be stolen if within one Celt unit's line of sight

Name: Chinese
Civ Bonus: Start game with 3 extra villagers but -50 wood and -200 food / Technologies cost -10% in Feudal Age, -15% in Castle Age, -20% in Imperial Age / Town Centers support 10 population instead of 5 / Town Center +5 LOS / Demolition Ships have +50% HP

Name: Ethiopians
Civ Bonus: Receive 100F 100G upon advancing to next age / Pikeman and Halberdier upgrades are free /  Foot archers reload time *0.85 (-15%)

Name: Franks
Civ Bonus: Foragers work 25% faster / Castles are 25% cheaper / Cavalry has +20% HP / Farm upgrades are free (Mill is required to receive bonus)

Name: Goths
Civ Bonus: Infantry cost 35% less (starting in Feudal Age) / Infantry have +1 attack against buildings / Villagers have +5 attack versus wild boar / Hunters carry +15 meat / +10 to population limit in Imperial Age

Name: Huns
Civ Bonus: Houses are not required to support population, start game with -100 Wood / Cavalry Archers cost -10% in Castle Age, -20% in Imperial Age / Trebuchets are 35% more accurate

Name: Incas
Civ Bonus: Start with free llama / Villagers affected by blacksmith upgrades / Houses support 10 population / Buildings cost -15% stone

Name: Indians
Team Bonus: Camels +6 attack vs buildings, Mamelukes and Camel Archers +5 vs buildings
Civ Bonus: Villagers Cost -10% in Dark, -15% in Feudal, -20% in Castle, -25% in Imperial / Fishermen(villagers) work 15% faster and carry +15 / Camels +1/+1 armor

Name: Italians
Civ Bonus: Advancing to the next age costs -15% / Dock techs cost -50% / Fishing ships cost -15W / Gunpowder units cost -20%

Name: Japanese
Civ Bonus: Fishing Ships have 2x HP and +2 pierce armor / Fishing Ships work +5% faster in Dark Age, +10% in Feudal Age, +15% in Castle Age, +20% in Imperial Age / Lumber Camps, Mining Camps, and Mills are 50% cheaper / Infantry attack 25% faster (starting in Feudal Age)

Name: Khmer
Civ Bonus: No buildings required to advance through Ages or unlock other buildings / Battle Elephants speed *1.15 (15% faster) / Villagers can garrison in Houses

Name: Koreans
Team Bonus: Mangonel line minimum range reduced to 1 (from 3)
Civ Bonus: Villagers have +3 line of sight / Stone miners work 20% faster / Guard Tower and Keep upgrades are free / Towers (except bombard towers) have +1 range in Castle Age, +2 in Imperial Age / Fortifications (walls, gates, castles, towers) are built 25% faster

Name: Magyars
Civ Bonus: Villagers kill wolves in 1 strike / Melee upgrades (forging, iron casting, blast furnace) in blacksmith free / Scout line costs -15%

Name: Malay
Civ Bonus: Advancing to ages 80% faster / Fish Traps cost -33% / Fish Traps provide unlimited food / Battle Elephants cost *0.75 (25% cheaper)

Name: Malians
Civ Bonus: Barracks units get +1 pierce armor per age / Buildings (except Farms) wood cost *0.85 (15% cheaper) / Gold mining upgrades free

Name: Mayans
Civ Bonus: Start game with 1 extra villager, -50 food / Natural resources last 15% longer / Archers cost -10% in Feudal Age, -20% in Castle Age, -30% in Imperial Age

Name: Mongols
Civ Bonus: Cavalry Archers reload 20% faster / Light Cavalry and Hussars have +30% HP / Hunters work 50% faster

Name: Persians
Civ Bonus: Start game with +50 wood and food / Town Center and Docks have 2x HP / Town Centers and Docks operate +10% faster in Feudal Age, +15% in Castle Age, +20% in Imperial Age

Name: Portuguese
Civ Bonus: All units cost -15% gold (0.85*cost) / All ships 1.1*HP (+10%) / Get Feitoria

Name: Saracens
Team Bonus: Foot archers have +2 attack bonus against buildings
Civ Bonus: Market costs -75W / Market trade cost is only 5% / Transport Ships have 2x HP and carry capacity / Galleys attack 20% faster / Cavalry Archers have +4 attack bonus against buildings

Name: Slavs
Team Bonus: Military buildings (barracks, archery ranges, siege workshops and stables) provide +5 population
Civ Bonus: Farmers work ~15% faster without upgrades / Tracking free / Siege units from siege workshop 15% cheaper

Name: Spanish
Civ Bonus: Villagers construct buildings 30% faster / Blacksmith upgrades do not cost any gold / Cannon Galleons benefit from Ballistics (less reload time and more accuracy) / Hand Cannoneers and Bombard Cannons reload 15% faster

Name: Teutons
Team Bonus: Units are more resistant to conversion
Civ Bonus: Monks have 2x healing range / Towers can garrison 2x units (more arrows) / Murder Holes is free / Farms cost 33% less / Town Centers garrison +10 units (total 25), total amount of arrows +5 (max 16)

Name: Turks
Civ Bonus: Gunpowder Units have +25% HP / Gunpowder technologies cost 50% less / Chemistry is free / Gold miners work 20% faster / Light Cavalry and Hussar upgrades are free

Name: Vietnamese
Civ Bonus: Reveal enemy positions at game start / Archery Range units +10% HP in Feudal, +15% in Castle, +20% in Imperial Age / Free Conscription

Name: Vikings
Civ Bonus: Warships cost -15% in Feudal/Castle, -20% in Imperial Age / Infantry have +10% HP in Feudal Age, +15% in Castle Age, +20% in Imperial Age / Wheelbarrow and Hand Cart are free /
